titleStmt.title: Military orders and articles established by His Majesty for the better ordering and government of His Majesties army also two proclamations, one against plundring and robbing, the other against selling or buying of armes and horse, with some other additions.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by His Majesties command at Oxford by Leonard Lichfield ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
